mapper.select: select id,banner from tb_curriculum where state='上线'AND top=1;

select c.id, c.title as name, c.suggestion, tp.icon, th.title, th.nick_name from tb_curriculum c join (select id from tb_curriculum_sales ORDER BY buyers DESC LIMIT 1)t on c.id=t.id join tb_curriculum_type tp on tp.id=c.type_id join tb_curriculum_teacher cth on c.id=cth.curriculum_id join tb_teacher th on cth.teacher_id=th.id;

select c.id, c.title as name, c.learning_cycle, c.tag, tp.icon, th.title, th.nick_name from tb_curriculum c join tb_curriculum_type tp on tp.id = c.type_id join tb_curriculum_teacher cth on c.id=cth.curriculum_id join tb_teacher th on cth.teacher_id=th.id where c.difficulty=#{difficulty} and c.state='上线' order by c.id desc limit 10
